mapper.select: select id,title,start_Date startDate,end_Date endDate ,create_Date createDate, description,task_Count taskCount,viewrange_Type viewrangeType,weixin_Gd weixinGd, weixin_Ls weixinLs,weixin_Apk weixinApk,weixin_Other weixinOther,apk_Url apkUrl, other_Url otherUrl,state from wx_manage_task t where t.isdelete=0
